CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( CE_Tech_Sale_Stage__c , "Pre-trial phase") , TODAY() - Went_to_CE_Pre_trial_Phase_Date__c , IF(ISPICKVAL( CE_Tech_Sale_Stage__c , "Tech discovery") , TODAY() - Went_to_CE_Technical_Discovery_Date__c , IF(ISPICKVAL( CE_Tech_Sale_Stage__c , "Trial management") , TODAY() - Went_to_CE_Trial_Management_Date__c , IF(ISPICKVAL( CE_Tech_Sale_Stage__c , "Tech proposal") , TODAY() - Went_to_CE_Technical_Proposal_Date__c , IF(ISPICKVAL( CE_Tech_Sale_Stage__c , "New key account identified") , TODAY() - Went_to_CE_New_Key_Account_Identified_Da__c ,NULL )))))
CustomField.label: Current CE Tech Stage Duration
